entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Leamington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
